title: Osteria dell'Utopia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bookshop and cafe serving food and drinks. Has soy cappuccino, seitan and tofu, fresh vegetables, salads, fresh orange juices, smoothies, local wine. Sources zero miles products. Pets and kids are welcome. At night often hosts events like book presentations and theatre performance. Free Wi-Fi. Established here since 2013.
